Class FurnitureCategory

java.lang.Object
FurnitureCategory
public class FurnitureCategory extends Object
FurnitureCategory denotes a specific category or type within the FurnitureStore system. Each category is distinct, such as chairs, tables, beds, or sofas. Every FurnitureCategory has a unique name, a general description outlining its features, and potentially other attributes like average price range, typical materials used, or general care instructions. This categorization helps both the store's staff and customers in sorting, identifying, and narrowing down their product searches. It streamlines inventory management by grouping similar items, facilitating bulk operations, and assisting in sales analytics. The FurnitureCategory also aids in promotional activities, allowing for category-wide discounts or special deals.

  • Constructor Details

    • FurnitureCategory

      public FurnitureCategory(int id, String typeName, Double maximumLoad, Boolean isOutdoor, Purchaser recentPurchaser)
      Constructs a FurnitureCategory object with the following attributes.
      Parameters:
      id - A unique identifier for each Category.
      typeName - The name of the furniture type,
      maximumLoad - Represents the maximum weight (in kilograms) the furniture type can support
      isOutdoor - Specifies if the furniture type is suitable for outdoor use.
      recentPurchaser - The latest purchaser of this furniture type.

    • isSuitableForOutdoor

      public boolean isSuitableForOutdoor()
      Checks if the furniture is suitable for outdoor use based on its properties: labeled for outdoor use and supporting more than 50 kilograms.
      Returns:
      true if it meets the outdoor suitability criteria, else false
